/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a sense of being in the midst of the city's hustle and bustle. The street is lined with trees, their leaves a vibrant green, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene. The buildings in the background, mostly white and gray, add an urban touch to the otherwise natural landscape. The image is taken from a low angle, looking down the street, which adds depth and perspective to the scene. The colors in the image are vivid, with the green of the trees and grass standing out against the blue sky and the grays and whites of the buildings.
